name: Stolen Memories
description:
Stolen Memories is a small story about a young man in search of his identity -- literally. Loras wakes up in the desert one morning, with only an unusually large green stone and a bunch of unhelpful villagers for clues.

Stolen Memories is a game I made on the fly to learn RPG Maker VX Ace. As such, it uses only the assets that are provided by default.

There are a couple of bugs and inconsistencies due to the nature of its development, I hope it's not too much of an inconvenience.

Send me an e-mail to veitralf@gmx.ch or tweet me @veitralf
